Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
31.05.2013 SH SCR15327 Added GSET_YESNO(8006) to trigger call of old/new version of BDC201DC (2 places)
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
12.04.2010 GB SCR15454 Changed condition in the step
2.1 Test if the debtor exists in DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODES
10.09.2009 AS SCR#14811 aqdded new parameter PI.SURPRESS_BDH005
01.04.2009 SH SCR14267 Added step for incomplete address handling (GSET_ID=292)
25.03.2009 SH SCR14267 Added test on DEBC_DEBH<>GSET_DEBH_NO(292)
in task "2.0 SearchDebtorIn DEBC"
29.10.2008 SH SCR14052 Removed part 2.2 B "Start searching in table
DEBTOR_HELLER_SEARCH where zipcode = blank or zipcode <> blank and there
was no debtor Heller found in test "
06.10.2008 SH SCR13755 Test 3: Fixed problem with test DHIC_ID <> DCLN_DHIC_ID
08.07.2008 SH SCR13755 Added Test 3 "Test if selected debtors already exist with
different ID numbers"
18.04.2008 SH SCR13475 Removed tests on DHCB
28.01.2008 SH SCR13139 Step2 Added test on DEBC_DEBC <> '0'
21.11.2007 SH SCR13139 Step2 Added test on DEBC_DEBH <> 23
20.11.2007 SH SCR13139 Added step2 (search debtor in DEBC)
02.07.2007 SH SCR12667 Added test on GSET_YESNO(259) <>'Y' to check existing
debtor in DBHS, see step 2.2
16.01.2007 AK SCR12205 convert DCLN name and addres values with BDH406
08.09.2006 SH SCR11839 Extended search on DHSH with DHSH_DEBH_NO <>
GSET_QUANTITY (GSET_ID = 97 = misc. debtor confidential clients)
13.07.2006 SH SCR11570 Added GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID=216) which uses for conditions
to perform steps 4.2 Multiple matches or 4.3 No match
06.06.2006 SH SCR11433 Added test for extraction of city, only a searchword > 2
characters is used now
14.04.2006 SH SCR10821 Extended step3 (serach without zip code) to store auto.
a new debtor client with BDC201DC, if there is only one match and GSET_YESNO = Y
where GSET_ID = 204
02.09.2005 SH SCR8983 Added new parameter PO.DEBC_NO, uses for argument list
if BDC201DC calls
20.01.2005 SH SCR7690 Added test to perfrom check on DHIC with and
INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE = Y
18.10.2004 SH SCR5831 Fixed bug with number of matched DEBH rows; uses now
a variable +1 instead of counter(0), bug exists since SCR6625, at 28.07.2004
29.07.2004 SH SCR6095 Changed some comments in program
28.07.2004 SH SCR6625 Added new test for matched debtor heller, only if
DHCB_CREDITUNIT<>'Y' then it's a possible match
27.04.2004 SH SCR6086 Redeuced search on DHSH_FIELDTYPE = 4 to only one
- DCLN_CITY partial name, see SCR for details
23.04.2004 SH SCR6086 Changed search on DHSH: 1. with zipcode if <> blank;
- 2. with city if zipcode = blank or first search does not have a match
15.04.2004 SH SCR5938 Added additional test to check DHSH without ZIPCODE, if
- no DHSH row was detected with ZIPCODE; Users have to handeld the new debtor
- manually if there was no match with ZIPCODE.
05.04.2004 SH SCR5887 Fixed bug in part "Search debtor heller in DHIC" if mult
- rows in DHIC were detected
16.10.2003 SH SCR4428 Use only searchwords (DHSH_FIELDTYPE = 1) if the lenght
16.10.2003 SH SCR4564 Extended range for debtor heller search with
- " and DEBH_DATDELETED is null "
08.10.2003 SH SCR4301 Added new parameter PI.DCLN_HADR_COUNTRY, uses to
select only debtor heller where PI.DCLN_HADR_COUNTRY = DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY,
in task 'Search debtor hellers in DHSH'
09.09.2003 SH SCR4301 Added new handling if the extracted zipcode = empty,
- in this case the new debtor client has to be handled with ODC200
18.08.2003 SH SCR4128 Fixed bug in Task "Check Housenumber"
1. Removed test on DCLN_LANGUAGE (Requested by JDO)
2. Restructured SEARCH DHSH
- Removed search for housenumber from DSQL
- Added new logic to search with housenumber (see SCR3884 for details)
- Changed writing of DCNA, rows will be written if more than one debtor was
detected or only one debtor without housenumber was detected
11.06.2003 SH SCR3729 Added two additional searchwords for name and address
- regarding to the special german characters
11.12.2002 SH SCR2515 Add procedure to ceck if the a debtor heller exist in
- DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODES, if TRUE the search in tabel DEBTOR_HELLER_SEARCH
- could be ignored and the program will go on with STEP 3
09.09.2002 SH If DCLN_DEFAULTLANGUAGE <> '' Step 5 could be done
13.06.2002 JJ disabled options + screen of tsk Get GNRL_CODE
03.06.2002 SH SCR1362 Store only new debtor client/heller if GNRL_CODE <> CZ/SK
- if no debtor was found in our database
29.04.2002 SH New requirements, Store DCLN_DEFLANGUAGE
--24.04.2002 SH Now the test for DCLN_HADR_NAME in debtorhellersearchwords
- will be done with the hole string, before we tested only the 5 first digits
-- only relevant if there was a unique match in table DHSH, need to store
-- in table DCLN
--> SEARCH DEBH in table DEBC
--> SEARCH DEBH in table DHIC
-->Test if debtor is incomplete
-- STEP 2.3 is only executed if no rows were detected in table DHIC
otherwise program continues with STEP 4; Skip step 2.3 also in case of
GSET_YESNO(259) = 'Y' (SCR12667 special belgium requirement)
--> SEARCH DEBH in table DHSH
-- Get search words for NAMES
-- Get search words for ADDRESS
-- Get search words for HOUSENUMBERS
-- Get search words for CITY
-- Get search words for ZIPCODE
-- Search debtor heller with the search words
... Step A --> Search with ZIP_CODE
... build searchstring to search with DCLN_CITY
-- Test if selected debtors already exist with different ID numbers
-- Store DEBTOR_CLIENT_NEW in table DEBC, only if one unique match was
-- detected for the new debtor client
... old version of BDC201DC
... new version of BDC201DC (SCR15327)
-- If multiple debtor heller were detected store number of written DCNA row
-- to DCLN (also if only one debtor client was selected without housenumbers)
-- No debtor heller was detected
-- Don't store new debtor client/heller if GNRL_CODE = 'CZ' or 'SK'
... old version of BDC201DC
... new version of BDC201DC (SCR15327)
-- Finally delete search words for actual DCLN_NO
-- 1 --> Move DEBH_NO to DCLN_DEBH and 1 to DCLN_NMATCH
-- 2 --> Move number of written DCNA rows to DCLN_NMATCH
-- 1 or 3 --> Move 'Y' to DCLN_MATCHPERFORMED
-- v.Trigger = 1
-- v.Trigger = 2
... uses in parenttask to store DEBC_DEBH in table DCLN for the new debtor
client

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DHIC_DEBH FROM :1/dhic, :1/debh WHERE DHIC_INFS_CODE= ':2' and DHIC_ID = ':3' and DEBH_NO = DHIC_DEBH and DEBH_DATDELETED is null FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Only perform if one debtor heller was detected
... uses in parenttask to store this DEBH_NO in table DCLN for the new debtor
client
... remove debtor heller from DCNA, there is only one unique match
-- Write detected debtor heller to DCNA
-- Store one DEBTOR_CLIENT_NEW_ADVICE row for every possible
-- match in table DEBTOR_HELLER

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT a.DHSH_DEBH_NO FROM :1 a, :1 b, :1 c, :14 WHERE a.DHSH_DEBH_NO <> :16 and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=b.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=c.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and (a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':2%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':3%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':4%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':5%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':6%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':7%' or a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':8%') and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and (b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':9%' or b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':10%' or b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':11%' or b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like ':12%' ) :13 and a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=DEBH_NO and DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY=':15' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- SEE INPUT - PARAMETERS SQL-STATEMENT
-- If one of the search words is empty we have to add a '-' in front of each
-- '%'. The character '-' is a separator which doesn't exist in any search word.
-- If there is a unique match in DHSH, the new debtor client could be written to
- DBEC with BDC201DC, see parent task
-- only relevant if only one debtor heller was detected
-- Delete previous written DCNA row
-- Check for housenumber only if there is a zipcode in DCLN; if there is no
-- zipcode one or more rows have to be written to DCNA, see below
-- If the check to housenumber(s) is OK for the current detected debtor heller
-- then this debtor will be used to write the new debtor client to database
=========== See EndTask Condition ===========
-- If the housenumber (s) is empty or does not exists in DCLN or DHSH
-- store one DCNA row, the user has to handle the new debtor manually
-- Store also all detected debtor heller to DCNA if the extracted zipcode =empty
-- Store one DEBTOR_CLIENT_NEW_ADVICE row for every possible
-- match in table DEBTOR_HELLER
-- If the housenumber does not exists in DCLN or DHSH (TYPE = 3)
-- we store one row to DCNA (new debtor has to handle manually)
-- The housenumber(s) exists in table DCLN and DHSH but the housenumber(s)
-- are unequal, then a new debtor heller can be stored --> See parent task
-- If the housenumber(s) in DCLN and DHSH are equal, then it's not necessary to
-- write a row to DCNA
-- Check the housenumber(s) only if min. 1 exists in table DCLN
-- Indepentially if the housenumber(s) are equal, set variable = TRUE, because
-- if a housenumber exists in DCLN and DHSH, but the housenumber(s) are
-- unequal a new debtor heller has to be written --> see T.S.
-- The detected debtor already exists with different ID number, so debtor should
not to be used
... if all DCNA rows are removed (because detected debtors already exists with
different debtor ID), set variables to 0 to trigger the storing of a new
debtor heller via BDC201DH
... if one debtor remains, set this debtor as detected
-- The detected debtor already exists with different ID number, so debtor should
not to be used, see G.S. where debtor is removed from table DCNA
(update v.DCNA_DEBH_NO with debtorH number if exsit with different DHIC_ID)
